00027 // DEBUG ONLY - Sets the error reporting level to the highest possible value

00030 /**
00031  * Class to create HTML comments
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Xhtml_Comment extends tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag implements ArrayAccess
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The text of the comment
00042      */
00043     protected $_comment = '';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * Class constructor
00047      * 
00048      * @return  NULL
00049      * @see     tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag::__construct
00050      */
00051     public function __construct( $text )
00052     {
00053         // Sets the comment text
00054         $this->_comment = $text;
00055         
00056         // Calls the parent constructor
00057         parent::__construct( '' );
00058     }
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * Returns the HTML comment
00062      * 
00063      * @param   boolean Wheter the output must be XML compliant
00064      * @param   int     The indentation level
00065      * @return  string  The HTML comment, if $xmlCompliant is false, otherwise a blank string
00066      */
00067     protected function _output( $xmlCompliant = false, $level = 0 )
00068     {
00069         // Checks if the output must be XML compliant
00070         if( !$xmlCompliant ) {
00071             
00072             // Returns the HTML comment
00073             $indent = str_pad( '', $level, self::$_TAB );
00074             return self::$_NL . $indent . '<!-- ' . $this->_comment . ' -->' . self::$_NL . $indent;
00075         }
00076         
00077         // Do not return the HTML comment when the output must be XML compliant
00078         return '';
00079     }
00080 }
